name: Maggie the Maggot Magnet
description:
This game is in PRE-ALPHA development, everything is subject to change. Preview build only.

Good morning, Maggie. Your plastic surgery has been booked with Dr. Notadoctor at 3 PM today. Be there prompt or your surgery will be cancelled.

You're Maggie and you're ugly. The only things attracted to you are maggots. Get from your house to the hospital without being devoured by a group of hungry maggots.
